channel.title: Players don't loose items when dying in the wild?
channel.description: When players pvp, they don't loose items when they die. Everyone is raging and its sad..

item.title: Players don't loose items when dying in the wild?
item.dc:creator: @cammyPVPftw cammyPVPftw
item.description:
@cammyPVPftw wrote:

Make sure where ever you pvp location is, your not in safepvp.

Read full topic
item.source: Players don't loose items when dying in the wild?

item.title: Players don't loose items when dying in the wild?
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

You need to catch sigint and invoke the destroyItems subroutine. And don’t forget to flush the dual-cycle pipeline, otherwise you’ll have dirty dupers running around your server.

Read full topic
item.source: Players don't loose items when dying in the wild?

item.title: Players don't loose items when dying in the wild?

item.description:
@holylouis wrote:

theres a code error in your coding …you have it where all players have mod rights in wild i cant remember exactly where to find the code but it should be like whenplayerdiesninwild/lose items player rights set 1 somewhere along that line u need to change the player rights for the wild
